metadata.synopsis: A soldier fighting alongside us during Assault on Moonrise. Lines for before, during, and after the battle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Trigger MOO's assault state with the Harpers / FF on your side.

0.speaker: Harper Olys
0.text: Gods above, the tadpoles. I think I saw one crawl out of a corpse.
0.context: NodeContext: Hint of nausea - very much a rookie

1.speaker: Harper Olys
1.text: If that army outside stirs, we'll keep them off your back.
1.context: NodeContext: Summoning courage but still queasy

2.speaker: Harper Olys
2.text: Wish I'd used the latrine. Always need to, before a battle.

3.speaker: Harper Olys
3.text: I'll stand, don't you worry. Jaheira's watching, after all.
3.context: NodeContext: Little nervous, trying to convince themselves and us both

4.speaker: Harper Olys
4.text: Can't believe you've got one of those worms in your head. Lucky for us you're on our side.
4.context: NodeContext: Hint of nausea - very much a rookie

5.speaker: Harper Olys
5.text: Put an end to this. Please.
5.context: NodeContext: Half supportive, half pleading. Just wants the fighting to be over.
